name: autocratic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
demanding that people obey completely, without asking or caring about anyone else's opinions: an autocratic ruler/regime an autocratic style of government/leadership/management The president resigned after 30 years of autocratic rule.

controlled by one leader who has total power, and who does not allow anyone else to make decisions: autocratic leadership/management/company An autocratic management style often results in high staff turnover and low employee morale. an autocratic regime/government/leader
